Titles.jpn: 俺が好きなのは妹だけど妹じゃない

Summaries.eng: The story centers around the younger sister Nagami Suzuka and the older brother Nagami. Suzuka is a beautiful third-year middle school student who has excellent grades and is the student council president. She wrote a novel about a little sister who dotes on her older brother, and the the novel wins a light novel award. After they discuss the matter, Yuu is the one who debuts as a proxy light novel author instead of Suzuka, under the pen name Chikai Towano.
Summaries.jpn:
ライトノベル作家を目指す高校生・永見右には、涼花という妹がいる。
涼花は才色兼備の優等生だが、兄には厳しくどこか冷たかった。
 ある日、ラノベ大賞では万年一次選考落ちの街に衝撃の事実が明かされる。
涼花が書いた“兄妹イチャイチャラブコメ”がラノベ 大賞を受賞したというのだ! 
しかも、ラノベや萌えが実は全く分からないという涼花の頼みで、 なぜか祐が代理の作家・永遠野誉として活動することに! 
不本意ながらも作家デビューを果たした祐は、個性的な業界関係者たちに揉まれながら、妹のために永遠野管として奮闘していく。
そして、お兄ちゃんラブな雰囲気は微塵も見せていなかった涼花が ...!?

Titles.eng: My Little Sister and I in a Virtual World, Part 1

Summaries.eng: Short animation included with volume 1 of the BD/DVD packages.

Titles.eng: My Little Sister and I in a Virtual World, Part 2

Summaries.eng: Short animation included with volume 2 of the BD/DVD packages.

Titles.eng: How my Sister and I Became Light Novel Authors
Titles.jpn: 俺と妹がラノベ作家になった理由

Summaries.eng: Nagami Yuu was a high school student aiming to become a light novel author, but he always stuck failing at the preliminary screenings. Then one day his little sister Suzuka comes to him with a shocking confession--she's won first prize in the new author contest!
Summaries.jpn: ライトノベル作家を目指す高校生・永見祐は、ある日、妹の涼花から衝撃の事実を告白される。なんと祐が万年一次選考止まりだったラノベ大賞を涼花が受賞したというのだ！

Titles.eng: My Little Sister Aims for the Greatest Heights
Titles.jpn: 俺の妹はどこまで高みを目指すんだ

Summaries.eng: The most beautiful girl in school, Himuro Mai, appears before Yuu. After learning that she's actually the light novel author, Enryuu Homura, she announces her desire to study Towano Chikai's talent and begins forcing her way into his private life.
Summaries.jpn: 祐の前に校内一の美少女・氷室舞がやってきた。実はラノベ作家・炎竜焔だという舞は、永遠野誓の才能を研究したいと言い出し、祐のプライベートを強引に詮索しはじめる。

Titles.eng: My Little Sister and I are Light Novel Authors Together
Titles.jpn: 俺と妹は二人で一人のラノベ作家だ

Summaries.eng: Reika proposes that Suzuka should introduce a new heroine and add more fanservice scenes. However, since she doesn't know what makes a scene fanservice, she learns about panchira (panty shots) from Yuu and tries recreating one herself?!
Summaries.jpn: 麗華にサービスシーンの強化と新ヒロインの登場を提案された涼花。しかし、サービスの意図がわからないため、祐から「ぱんちら」を学び、実際に試してみようとして……!?

Titles.eng: I Just Wanted to Catch Up to My Little Sister, That's All
Titles.jpn: 俺はただ、妹に追いつきたかっただけなんだ

Summaries.eng: At Towano Chikai's signing, a beautiful woman proclaims to be a huge, huge, huge fan of his work. To Yuu's surprise, that woman is the popular voice actress Minazuki Sakura! She's also gotten so absorbed into the novels that she starts calling Yuu "Onii-chan"?!
Summaries.jpn: 永遠野誓のサイン会に、大大大ファンを名乗る美少女がやってきた。その正体は、なんと人気声優の水無月桜！　作品に入れ込む彼女は、祐をお兄ちゃんと呼びはじめて……!?

Titles.eng: I Love My Little Sister More Than Anything in the World
Titles.jpn: 俺は妹が世界で一番大好きだ

Summaries.eng: Yuu and the others arrive at Mai's villa where the women have fun with Yuu on the beach, get him to lather them up, and cause an unexpected event in the shower room! Meanwhile, Mai also takes bold action to try and uncover Yuu's secret!
Summaries.jpn: 舞の別荘にやってきた祐たち。ビーチでサンオイル、シャワールームで思わぬハプニングと、祐は女性陣に翻弄されてばかり。そんな中、祐の秘密を探る舞が大胆な行動に出る！

Titles.eng: Our Hakuou Girl's School Culture Festival
Titles.jpn: 俺と妹の白桜女学院文化祭

Summaries.eng: Yuu and the others help Ahegao Double Peace-sensei at a doujinshi exhibition. There they encounter the Kanzaki sisters who run a major circle. After getting caught up in the sore relationship between them and Ahegao Double Peace-sensei, Yuu gets roped into a doujinshi competition!
Summaries.jpn: 同人誌即売会でアヘ顔Wピース先生の手伝いをする祐たち。すると、大手サークルを運営する神坂姉妹がやってくる。両者の因縁に巻き込まれた祐は、同人誌対決をするハメに！

Titles.eng: My Sister and I Face a Doujinshi Contest We Can't Lose
Titles.jpn: 俺と妹の絶対に負けられない同人誌対決

Summaries.eng: As the creation of their doujinshi enters its peak, Suzuka comes down with high fever. Yuu follows her requests to pick out her underwear, wipe her down, etc., but then she comes at him with an even harder request!

Titles.eng: About The Time I Got a New Little Sister
Titles.jpn: 俺に新しく妹ができた件について

Summaries.eng: Towano Chikai's work is finally getting animated! The meeting with the director is just around the corner, but Sakura intrudes on their home after running away from hers. They both wind up hiding from Suzuka and spending the night together, but...
Summaries.jpn: 永遠野誓の作品がいよいよアニメ化！　監督との顔合わせが迫る中、家出した桜が祐の自宅に押しかけてくる。二人は涼花に隠れて、一夜をともに過ごすことになり……。

Titles.eng: Our Special Training at the Theme Park
Titles.jpn: 俺と妹たちの遊園地特訓

Summaries.eng: In order to prevent the novel's heroine from being revised, Yuu must perfect his love of little sister moe. Yuu and Suzuka both attend Sakura's radio program as guests, and Yuu begins flirting with Suzuka while on air as part of his training to become moe for little sisters, but...
Summaries.jpn: 原作の改変を阻止するためには、妹萌えを極めなければならない。祐は桜のラジオ番組に涼花とゲスト出演し、妹萌えの特訓として涼花とイチャイチャしはじめるのだが……。

Titles.eng: It's Okay for Me to Be Moe for Little Sisters

Summaries.eng: Fading footsteps. Overlapping memories. It all started with the promise made that day. One who couldn't be honest with herself. One who constantly looked away from the truth. Will Yuu and Suzuka be able to face their true feelings?
Summaries.jpn: 逃げ出したあと。重なる幻影。すべてはあの約束からはじまっていた。素直になれなかった自分、ずっと目をそらしてきた自分。祐と涼花は、本当の気持ちに向き合えるのか？
